item.title: Siri Touch Typing Easter Egg
item.description: If you type the home row keys of the QWERTY layout into Spotlight Search twice, Siri understands that you are touch typing and suggests a relevant page from Wikipedia. Steps to reproduce Make sure you’re connected to the internet. Type asdfjkl;asdfjkl; into Spotlight Search. (TODO - I want to add the image here. Figuring out how to do that in Hugo.)
